summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4090 for the improvement of 45th Avenue South, from Brandon Street to Bennett Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading, graveling and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49149, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
